summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PluralSkill LMS - both backend APIs and frontend UI are functioning well with 90.5% backend success rate and successful frontend flows

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for course creation
Returns 200 instead of 201 for workshop creation

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, courses, and workshops
Course catalog page with search and filters working
Admin login with admin@pluralskill.com / admin123 successful
Admin dashboard accessible with all tabs (courses, users, workshops)
Admin stats display correctly (2 users, 5 courses, 5 published, 3 workshops)
Course enrollment flow working with success notifications
My Courses page showing enrolled courses
User profile page accessible and editable
User registration and login APIs working
Course CRUD operations for admin working
Authentication security working (401 for protected endpoints, 403 for admin-only)
